Posts.Content: May 28, 2009 11:55PM Skylish wrote: Hi There,   Just wanted to let you know that my mom had one of these about 2 months ago.  She was terrfied of the procedure, pain, results, etc.  Well, she said there was NO pain except a little sting with lido. She said the "gun" thing made a funny noise, but that was all.  Thankfully she had a positive outcome to the whole procedure.  But, for someone that was so worried and scared about the procedure she said she was pleased and surprised that it went to so smoothly.  True, everyone is different, but I thought you might like a positive story to get you through.  Never appologize for being scared or nervous.  We understand.  Glad to hear you are taking your husband with you. Be sure to let us know how the procedure went and what the results are.  I will be carrying you close to my heart during these next couple of weeks.
Posts.Title: Scheduled for an ultrasound mammotome biopsy rosiesmom lesjules
